contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Station | name= West Irving Station | image=DART-TRE West Irving.jpg | image_size=275px | image_caption= DART buses and TRE trains awaiting departure. | address= 4200 Jackson Street<br>Irving, Texas 75061 | coordinates={{coord|32.8161|-97.0072|type:railwaystation_region:US-TX|display=inline,title}} | line= {{rail color box|system=DART|line=TRE}} | other= DART Routes {{DART RFB|505}} (M-F) and {{DART RFB|514}} (M-F). | platform= 1 [[island platform]] | tracks=2 | parking=free, no overnight | bicycle=bike racks available | passengers= | pass_year= | pass_percent= | opened= November 13, 2000<ref name="October 29, 2000">{{cite news | last =Richter | first =Marice | title =Trinity Express to expand: Ridership exceeding target, official says | work =The Dallas Morning News | date =October 29, 2000}}</ref> | rebuilt= | ADA=Yes | code= | owned= [[Dallas Area Rapid Transit]] | zone=Eastern TRE Fare Zone | services= {{s-rail|title=Trinity Railway Express}} {{s-line|system=DART|line=TRE|previous=CentrePort/DFW Airport|next=Downtown Irving/Heritage Crossing}} }} '''West Irving Station''' is a [[Trinity Railway Express]] [[commuter rail]] station located in [[Irving, Texas]], at Jackson Street near Esters Road (between [[Dallas]] and [[Fort Worth, Texas]]). It opened on November 13, 2000, and is a station on the [[Trinity Railway Express|TRE commuter line]], serving [[Irving Mall]] with connecting [[bus]] service to [[Las Colinas]] and [[North Lake College]]. Unlike many rail stations, West Irving does not have an indoor heating/cooling facility, nor does it have a station attendant. However, it does have passenger shelters for bus and TRE riders. ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== * [http://www.trinityrailwayexpress.org/westirvingstation.html TRE - West Irving Station] * [http://www.dart.org DART - Dallas Area Rapid Transit] [[Category:Trinity Railway Express stations]] [[Category:Dallas Area Rapid Transit|West Irving (TRE station)]] [[Category:Railway stations opened in 2000]] {{Texas-railstation-stub}}
